name: make
signature: <const Id extends string, const TopLevel extends (true | false) = false>(identifier: Id, options?: { readonly topLevel?: TopLevel; }) => HttpApiGroup<Id, never, never, never, TopLevel>
description:
An `HttpApiGroup` is a collection of `HttpApiEndpoint`s. You can use an `HttpApiGroup` to
represent a portion of your domain. The endpoints can be implemented later using the `HttpApiBuilder.group` api.
documentation:
An `HttpApiGroup` is a collection of `HttpApiEndpoint`s. You can use an `HttpApiGroup` to
represent a portion of your domain.

The endpoints can be implemented later using the `HttpApiBuilder.group` api.
